events.message: I received my order yesterday, but the item is not what I expected and I would like to request a refund.
The case has been categorized as a refund request based on the customer's statement regarding dissatisfaction and refund.
Assigning customer query regarding refund request to the appropriate support agent for further handling.
Hello! Thank you for contacting support. I understand you want to request a refund. Iâ€™m here to assist you.
Could you please provide your order number and the reason why you want a refund so we can process your request quickly?
Sure, my order number is 123456789. The product did not meet the description on the website, so I would like to return it.
Thank you for the information. We can initiate the refund process once you return the product. I will send you the return label shortly.
That sounds good, thank you for the quick response and help with the refund process.
The refund case has been resolved by providing the return label and instructions to the customer.
Checking in to confirm you have received the return label and to see if you need any further assistance with your refund.
The case has been formally closed after confirming the refund was successfully processed and the customer is satisfied.
